scripts.heroku-postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');let commit='unknown',branch='development';try{commit=execSync('git rev-parse --short HEAD',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim();branch=execSync('git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD',{encoding:'utf8'}).trim()}catch(e){commit=process.env.SOURCE_VERSION?process.env.SOURCE_VERSION.substring(0,7):'unknown'}fs.writeFileSync('.version.json',JSON.stringify({commit,branch,buildTime:new Date().toISOString()}));console.log('Version info saved:',{commit,branch});"
